Hi, I'm Nick â€“

Nurse / Musician / Developer

I earned my Master of Music in French horn performance and played in professional ensembles in Cleveland, OH. I taught myself to code and worked as a web developer for the awe-inspiring team at Whiteboard.

I sing baritone in the Nashville Symphony Chorus and in Opera Tennessee here in Chattanooga. I decided to pursue my love for medicine and people by becoming a cardiac nurse here at Erlanger.

This site is just for fun to 1) have a digital landing pad and 2) play around with some ideas. Any questions, feel free to reach out!
